Articles.Content:
Straight from the many rooms of the coding team of Mad Kid Game Studio,

Shooting Simulator 2015!

Coming 3.5.15.

madkidgamestudio.weebly.com/products.html
If this is what I think it is, sounds hilarious. sorta like "JFK Reloaded"?
Nope. Like a shooting range, but for cheap (2.95+optional donations)
